GrSkin * GrSkin::CloneRange ( const tstring &  name,
URef< GrMesh >  bindMesh,
unsigned int  vertexStart,
unsigned int  vertexCount 
)

clones a range of the skin. This should be used when a range of a mesh is cloned.

ensure that the range passed in is valid.

there should be one skin element for every vertex in the mesh passed in.

return a new skin.
